property.name: customClass
property.label: Custom Class Name
property.description: Custom CSS class name. Usually remains blank.

property.name: displayVariant
property.label: Display Option
property.description: Select the default format of the card. Options are: None (flat) or Featured (drop shadow), Outline (flat with border).

property.name: showProgressRing
property.label: Show Progress Ring
property.description: Select to display task progress ring.

property.name: showCloneButton
property.label: Show Clone Button
property.description: Select to display the Full Clone Button.

property.name: showOwner
property.label: Show Owner
property.description: Select to display the owner of the adventure.

property.name: showTaskRemaining
property.label: Show Tasks Remaining
property.description: Select to display number of task remaining.

property.name: listId
property.label: Component Group
property.description: Unique ID to link complimentary components together to share data.
